seller_description: Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner effectively eliminates 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including the COVID-19 virus (SARS-CoV-2) on hard, non-porous surfaces in just 2 minutes (EPA Reg 777-66). This disinfecting spray not only provides a deep clean by eliminating germs, removing soap scum, and cutting through tough grease and grime but also deodorizes with a refreshing tropical Mango and Hibiscus scent. Versatile and convenient, it can be used on multiple hard surfaces throughout the home, including the kitchen and bathroom. As a trusted leader in disinfection, Lysol offers a range of great products, including disinfecting wipes, sprays, and all-purpose cleaners, for all your cleaning needs.
review: Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner turns mundane cleaning tasks into a refreshing experience with its delightful Mango and Hibiscus scent! Designed to eliminate 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including COVID-19, this cleaner is your go-to solution for maintaining a sparkling, germ-free home. From removing stubborn grease and soap scum to deodorizing hard surfaces, it delivers unmatched performance with every use. Its vibrant packaging and tropical aroma bring a touch of joy to every cleaning session, making it an essential addition to your household routine.
Expected_output: The seller promotes Lysol All-Purpose Cleaner as a highly effective disinfectant that kills 99.9% of viruses and bacteria, including COVID-19, within two minutes on hard, non-porous surfaces. It is described as versatile for use in kitchens, bathrooms, and other areas, effectively removing grease, grime, and soap scum while leaving behind a tropical Mango and Hibiscus scent. The seller’s images showcase the product's vibrant packaging and clearly emphasize its germ-killing power and refreshing fragrance. The buyer’s image corroborates these claims, displaying an identical product with intact branding and labeling that matches the seller’s description and visuals. The product appears well-packaged and in excellent condition, with no visible discrepancies. While the buyer’s feedback on product performance is absent, the strong alignment between the seller’s claims, images, and the delivered product suggests satisfaction. In conclusion, the product delivered meets the advertised promises, reflecting the seller’s reliability and attention to detail. This transaction highlights the product’s value as an effective and pleasant cleaning solution, ensuring a positive experience for the buyer.
label: -1: buyers opinion
